name: Umbragram
description:
Umbragram is a puzzle game about perception. You're presented with two
silhouettes, and you have to build a structure that casts those shadows.
The area where your structure sits lacks perspective, so the more
complex shapes can only be understood with its shadows.

The game is written in Lua, using Love2d.

A collaboration with Harry Sadler

Kindred: Picross, Marble Madness, Echochrome
